title: Request: Tab Titles to Follow Current SSH Session
author: ejtbrown
body_snippet:
|||
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75.7008.17907  |


<!-- Feature Request -->
I've previously used MTPuTTY, but have switched to mRemoteNG. I find mRemoteNG to be better in every way... except one. The titles of tabs in MTPuTTY follow SSH connections.

Example:
1) Open an SSH connection tab to hostA.example.com; the title of the tab is 'hostA.example.com'
2) On the command line of hostA, ssh to hostB.example.com

In mRemoteNG, the title of the ...
